message.body: Hey what's up?
Hey. Happy Sunday! Not much here. Meeting my ex g/f for coffee in a little while - for the first time since the break up 3 months ago. We're trying to b
e friends. What's up with you?
Visiting my dad in poughkeepsie ny. havent been home in months...
Trade you. ;-)
I haven't been to NY in years...
Haha. yeah that sounds tough, and i've been in that situation before.
Not to sound cynical but i haven't really maintained friendships with exes...
I have...but this one is different. She's the most narcissistic woman I've ever met. I'm not sure that I'd get a friendship in return. She manipulates an
d uses. I'm just trying it put to give her the benefit of the doubt.
Well good luck i hope you're meeting in a neutral space.
Where are you from?
Yeah. Starbucks. She's bringing shirts I left at her house, but not the $400 I let her borrow. Los Angeles. My whole family is from NY - I was the only
one born out here. I'm also the only one that has lived there since my family moved to CA in '69...
How'd it go?
Just ended. 4hrs. Coffee. Local CD shop. Kinda updated eachother. She bought new boots, despite owing me and other people money... Bittersweet. How's pops?
He's doing well. talking about digital instruments and sounding really old.
How old is he?
62, but i was exaggerating. he just has a funny way of articulating himself sometimes
Do you like la? been thinking about moving there.
